statements: UPDATE ticket_sales_data SET tickets_sold = tickets_sold + 10 WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE ticket_sales_data SET revenue = 1500.50, tickets_sold = 20 WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE ticket_sales_data SET tickets_sold = tickets_sold + 10, revenue = revenue + (10 * ticket_price) WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE ticket_sales_data SET tickets_sold = tickets_sold - 5, ticket_price = 150.5, revenue = tickets_sold * ticket_price WHERE event_name = 'Music Festival';
